title: The 2030 Cliff
prompt: A rural kitchen table at dawn, cluttered with papers, calendars, and a half-empty coffee cup, shot from above at a slight angle. Soft golden light streams through a window onto weathered wood, casting long shadows across handwritten notes and documents. A hand reaches across the table toward a calendar marked with dates, fingers paused mid-motion. The composition should feel documentary and intimate—the quiet weight of planning under constraint—with muted earth tones and the texture of rural domesticity conveying both burden and determination.
